allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Perf: Move Telegram alerts off request thread to reduce order latency

Wrap all telegram_alert_service.send_order_alert\(\) calls with
socketio.start_background_task\(\) to move DB lookups and message
formatting off the request thread entirely.

Previously, even when Telegram was not configured, the synchronous
DB lookups \(get_username_by_apikey, get_telegram_user_by_username\)
would block the order response by 5-100ms.

Affected services:
- place_order_service
- place_smart_order_service
- cancel_order_service
- cancel_all_order_service
- basket_order_service
- close_position_service
- place_options_order_service
- options_multiorder_service
- modify_order_service
- sandbox_service
- split_order_service

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
